channel.title: Server nuller help!
channel.description: this guy wont stop nulling server and i dont know how to stop!! does any1 kno a way to stop this cuz i dont like restarting server evry2 min :eek:

item.title: Server nuller help!
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“Elven Dremor, post:4, topic:270778”][quote]public void antispammer() {
if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") ||

playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&")
|| playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") ||

playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">")
|| playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{")
|| playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("") || playerName.contains("") || playerName.contains("___")

|| playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains(“SYI”)
|| playerName.contains(“SYIpkpker”) || playerName.contains(“syi”) || playerName.contains(“Syi”) || playerName.contains(“null”) || playerName.contains(“fuck”) ||

playerName.contains(“bitch”)) {
if(kickTimer == 0) {
yell(playerName+" = [Symbolised Player Logging in] [Dragon-HistoryHandler]Illegal Username!");
disconnected = true;
disconnected = true;
disconnected = true;
disconnected = true;
disconnected = true;
}
kickTimer = 0;
}
}
public int kickTimer = 0;[/quote][/quote]

That does nothing.

There are several tutorials in the Tutorial Section. Look harder.

Read full topic

item.title: Server nuller help!
item.dc:creator: @Elven_Dremor Elven Dremor
item.description:
@Elven_Dremor wrote:

public void antispammer() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") ||

playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&")
|| playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") ||

playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">")
|| playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{")
|| playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("") || playerName.contains("") || playerName.contains("___")

|| playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains(“SYI”)
|| playerName.contains(“SYIpkpker”) || playerName.contains(“syi”) || playerName.contains(“Syi”) || playerName.contains(“null”) || playerName.contains(“fuck”) ||

playerName.contains(“bitch”)) {
if(kickTimer == 0) {
yell(playerName+" = [Symbolised Player Logging in] [Dragon-HistoryHandler]Illegal Username!");
disconnected = true;
disconnected = true;
disconnected = true;
disconnected = true;
disconnected = true;
}
kickTimer = 0;
}
}
public int kickTimer = 0;
